title._content: [Portrait of Sol (Solomon) Yaged, Joe Thomas, and Rex William Stewart, Pied Piper, New York, N.Y., ca. Sept. 1947] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Sol (Solomon) Yaged, Joe Thomas, and Rex William Stewart, Pied Piper, New York, N.Y., ca. Sept. 1947] 1 negative : b&w ; 2 1/4 x 2 1/4 in. Caption from Down Beat: One of the weekly jam sessions sponsored in the Village by Timmie Rosenkrantz produced these photos, by Got. Last group has Stewart, Yaged and Joe Thomas, trumpet. One modern and several standard groups were used. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 296 Reference print available in Music Division, Library of Congress. Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). In: "All kinds of musical allegiances gather under the Dane's banner," Down Beat, v. 14, no. 19 (Sept. 10, 1947), p. 3. Subjects: Yaged, Sol (Solomon) Thomas, Joe Stewart, Rex William, 1907-1967 Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Clarinetists--1940-1950. Trumpet players--1940-1950. Pied Piper Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Group portraits--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950. Rights Info: Mr. Gottlieb has dedicated these works to the public domain, but rights of privacy and publicity may apply. lcweb2.loc.gov/diglib/ihas/html/gottlieb/gottlieb-copyrig... Repository: (negative) Library of Congress, Prints & Photographs Division, Washington D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print (reference print) Library of Congress, Music Division, Washington D.C. 20540 USA, loc.gov/rr/perform/ Part Of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (DLC) 99-401005 General information about the Gottlieb Collection is available at lcweb2.loc.gov/diglib/ihas/html/gottlieb/gottlieb-home.html Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.music/gottlieb.09421 Call Number: LC-GLB23- 0942
